snippet.title: Golden Age of Racing - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
The mid 1960's was a time of racing legends, a time when race car drivers were the real heroes. Golden Age of Racing (also known as GP Classic Racing for its Wii release) gives you the chance to relive the best years of Grand Prix racing. These cars are high horse-power, no down-force, rear-wheel-drive works of automotive art! Push your car to the limit around ten of the most challenging tracks on the international circuit competing against incredibly intelligent opponents that know how to hold a grudge.

Developed by Brain in a Jar, this was one of their budget racing sims. Between 2004 and 2011, they worked with budget publishers like Oxygen Interactive, Blast! Entertainment, Midas Interactive and even Nordic Games (who later became what we know as Embracer Group).

PS2 and PC-ROM versions published by Midas Interactive
Wii version published by Nordic Games in Europe and Maximum Family Games in the US.
Also released on PlayStation 3 (as part of PS2 Classics in the European PlayStation Store), PC and Nintendo Wii.

#braininajar #midasinteractive #ps2 #playstation2 #retrogaming #retrogames #goldenageofracing #gpclassicracing #nordicgames
